message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell my product and believe it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $22,000 to start.  What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,000?

Bob, I appreciate you countering.  $12,000 is quite a bit below what I can consider. I have another buyer interested at a significantly higher price, but I believe this product can be a great asset to you. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $18,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $18,500 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $15,000?
